name: Roll Test Project
description:
Spy Hop Production

Youth Made Media

The program is offered in two parts—attending both sessions is suggested but not required.

Work with a team of designers, programmers, and producers to create a full video game that investigates a social, community or global issue. You’ll use Unity 3D, Maya, and other industry standard software to develop your game.

At the end of the spring session, we will premiere your games at Power Up, Party Down!

Tuesdays & Thursdays, 6-8 PM 
Ages 15-19
Fall: October 17, 2017 – February 22, 2018
Spring: March 13, 2018 – July 19, 2018
